question: Which state cabinet approves the extension of Metro rail from Narela (Delhi) to Kundli (Sonepat District)?
explanation: The Haryana Cabinet has approved the extension of Metro rail from Narela (Delhi) to Kundli (Sonepat District). The Narela to Kundli extension (4.86 km long) will have three stations namely Narela Sector 5, Kundli and Nathupur.
